int nfs4_Compound (  nfs_arg_t *  parg,
exportlist_t *  pexport,
fsal_op_context_t *  pcontext,
cache_inode_client_t *  pclient,
hash_table_t *  ht,

nfs_res_t *  pres
) 
 

nfs4_COMPOUND: The NFS PROC4 COMPOUND

Implements the NFS PROC4 COMPOUND. This routine processes the content of the nfsv4 operation list and composes the result. On this aspect it is a little similar to a dispatch routine. Operation and functions necessary to process them are defined in array optab4 .

Parameters:
parg [IN] generic nfs arguments
pexportlist [IN] the full export list
pcontex [IN] context for the FSAL (unused but kept for nfs functions prototype homogeneity)
pclient [INOUT] client resource for request management
ht [INOUT] cache inode hash table
preq [IN] RPC svc request
pres [OUT] generic nfs reply
See also:
nfs4_op_<*> functions
